titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Lord Mayor of the Cit[y] of London, the right worshipfull the aldermen his brethren, and the commons in Common Councell assembled. The humble petition of many thousand well affected inhabita[nts] in and about the said city

notesStmt.note: Printed on right half of sheet: A good motion (also published separately as Wing (2nd ed.) G1052).
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
